text:
Hey guys, me again!

We're building a react app and hosting it on HubSpot CMS as a module on a page. *Is there any way for us to write HubL inside of a React components?*

We would love to use HubL for fetching data from HubDB for example, instead of using API calls because of the limits, but I'm not sure if it's possible to write HubL inside of the React app. I managed to log some HubSpot variables from within the app but I can't manage to write HubL.
